website_summaries.verdict: An all-around effective and gentle enzyme stain fighter laundry detergent from a well-respected brand name.
pros: All of the tough cleaning power you want with none of the synthetic ingredients you don't
Essential oils give a light fragrance that softly lingers
Safe for cloth diapers and all of baby's textiles
Parents who use baby carriers or wraps love that it is free of optical brighteners
cons: Definitely a more expensive option than others

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry soap for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for 6 months and it’s great! The smell is perfect (think YL gentle baby) and it works hard to get dirt out of clothing, which is a must with three messy boys!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Very effective. Love that it's gentle and sustainable
customer_reviews.text: Very effective detergent in my He washer. I've used it for many different types of loads and I really like that it doesn't have a fragrance and is more sustainable. I can't tell a difference in cleanliness between this and tide. The bottles are smaller than traditional detergent bottles in the store and they were shipped with tape on the cap to prevent leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Buy ‘N Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for those who don't like a strong scent
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product for baby laundry since it gets rid of the stains easily and the scent is really gentle. I personally don't like to have our clothes, especially the baby clothes scented so it is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: NOOOOO. I transitioned from Dreft to this and now my baby clothes have STAINS all over them!
customer_reviews.author: hanauer

customer_reviews.title: I am surprised. Really works!
customer_reviews.text: My L.O. has horrible eczema and this truly helped. Lovely scent too
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great, Simple Laundry Soap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this detergent primarily to wash kid's clothing. I was pleasantly surprised at how effective it was! It doesn't have a strong smell and does a fantastic job of getting our clothes clean. This has become our default laundry soap.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Over all great detergent!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great detergent!! My clothes smell fresh and this stuff really gets my clothes clean! Even difficult stains on my children’s clothes (if treated first of course).
customer_reviews.author: Caraleigh Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. I tried lots of other natural baby detergents before settling on this one... It gets the clothes cleaner and fresher than other popular (natural) brands...
customer_reviews.author: VHReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great for diaper blowouts!
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but you only need a small amount to do the job. On the occasional diaper blowouts and when the DD's clothes are heavily soiled, I'll wash them twice with this detergent, and it removes all stains. I also love that when the clothes are dry, they are fragrance free. Most importantly, it removes all stains and leaves clothes CLEAN!
customer_reviews.author: xcuzm3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for stains and whites
customer_reviews.text: Gets stains out with ease. Keeps white clothes white not dingy and grayed. Have allergies to many detergents but no problem with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this laundry soap for my baby or 4 year olds clothes- clothes did not smell washed after use- the babies clothing still smelled like formula-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent and comes in small packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I am expecting our baby in June and bought this detergent after doing much research. Pros: -Pleasant, but strong smell. Smell goes away after washing. Leaves clothes very soft. -Comes in very small packaging which is good for the environment and for storage. Cons: -Like other reviews the bottles leaked during shipping but it was very easy to wash the soap off. Good purchase for the money. Good for the environment and for baby!
customer_reviews.author: Hime

customer_reviews.title: Good for everyone’s laundry
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Nice scent very mild and cleans well
customer_reviews.author: SL。214

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. We have a 10 week old baby with sensitive skin, and this is perfect. It smells only faintly (pleasantly) in the bottle, and clothes retain no scent at all. A little goes a long way, removes spit up stain and generally leaves clotges clean. Ours arrived without leaks, and we will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: smpphiladelphia

customer_reviews.title: Good detergent for babies
customer_reviews.text: Good detergent and the price was good.... two bottles lasted us about 3-4 months Also for all the people “freaking out” about the tape on the lid... that’s a packing precaution so they don’t damage and release detergent everywhere!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand!! It’s good for your body and works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbi S

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cause rashes on kids' sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: We use this because it doesn't cause rashes on kids' sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Super small and watery
customer_reviews.text: I order not realizing how small they where, very expensive for ths amount you get. The detergent seems watery , i feel a have to use more than the reccomended cap, to clean bigger loads
customer_reviews.author: Christina Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a very light not overpowering smell. Removes stains. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maya McCarroll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby laundry
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well with little smell that's pleasant. Perfect for baby laundry. Just a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Yan L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I only gave 4 stars because it leaked pretty good during the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: If left my babies clothes feeling odd, they didnt feel clean at all. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: SamPoindex

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: This laundry detergent is great. Its hypoallergenic and works great on tough baby stains. I can use a little bit and it removes most of the stains. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PCHoy

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles leaked. I ordered baby blossom “scent” not baby detergent Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was opened when i received the item
customer_reviews.text: Good but the bottle was opened when i received the item
customer_reviews.author: Agathe & Sacha

customer_reviews.title: Good soap.
customer_reviews.text: I use buncha farmers stain stick on anything tough to get out before I wash. It has no scent and works well. We all have sensitive skin and have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Al Kells

customer_reviews.title: Truly removes tough stains on my baby's cloth and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Truly removes tough stains on my baby's cloth and it has a mild baby friendly smell. Also, a little amount is required for a big wash!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tolulope

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: only problem is the strong scent. baby product need to be no scent or light scented.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos has super sensitive skin and this product cleans and does not cause any reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Espeland

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value, good product. I tried it because it was cheaper than the leading baby brand detergent. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, has some chemicals I don't like
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of sodium laureth sulfate, and this one has it. I didn't research it enough, I was looking for cleaning power and found this one to be rated best. However, I'm not willing to sacrifice the health of my family and my environment. It definitely is a BETTER choice that most other detergents out there.
customer_reviews.author: Tally

customer_reviews.title: This detergent is amazing! It is unscented and it gets our kids ...
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is amazing! It is unscented and it gets our kids clothes so clean that we started using it for all of our household laundry. Better than any other product we have tried, "green" or otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: ally2929

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great for our daughter who has terrible eczema and allergy issues.
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: with decent smell and doesn't dry out hands that much
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Is this authentic seventh generation?
customer_reviews.text: Afraid what is in this bottle has been tampered with and is not the actual brand. Bottle has tape around outside and a nasty goop buildup around opening and cap. Will not use for my newborn!!!! Awful!
customer_reviews.author: TARA DECKER

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it once to wash the baby's clothes before she arrives and I like how there's no fragrance, but still smells fresh. I gave it three stars because when we received it, one of the bottles was leaking in the packaging, so I think the packaging could be more secure.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Guetz

customer_reviews.title: When I opened the box and I only got one ...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box and I only got one bottle! Price is way too high for such a little bottle, As the same price, you could buy two bottles on  ....will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for real dirty clothing..
customer_reviews.text: Seems to clean clothes that aren't very dirty, but it doesn't get stains out well or odors. Had to try another detergent because my two year old had accidents while potty training and the clothes smelled like urine after being washed!
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Furman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for my nephew who has eczema. No issues when using this detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie G

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Mild
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent. I have been using it for several months now for all of my laundry, not just the baby's. My baby girl has mild excema and switching to this detergent plus stopping using the softener sheets seems to have made a difference in her skin. She has fewer red patches and less often. Plus, our clothes are just as clean as ever! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The heavy package was squeezed into my mail box! I had hard time to take it out. Seriously?
customer_reviews.author: T.A.

customer_reviews.title: In due time
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's for newborns, she's not quite here yet but after I test it on her I will review more..
customer_reviews.author: Rickey Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Too expencive. Better price (50%) available.
customer_reviews.text: Product is very good. One star is only because of price. On April 15th I ordered two bottles for $23.00. And when I click "order it again" I was expected two bottles again. I received only one. I was trying to return it, but it was $8 for shipping label. It is my mistake, I should review it before place an order.... But it is still tricky. Same product available for 22.99 for two bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.MorkoFFka

customer_reviews.title: it was opend
customer_reviews.text: When I got this products, lids were opend and leaked.. I bought this for my new born baby.. so I feel so bad on this.
customer_reviews.author: Kwon Oh-Joon

customer_reviews.title: Hi, I received this liquid laundry just now. But ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I received this liquid laundry just now. But I got only just one. I know that i have to receive two stuff. please check it out.
customer_reviews.author: zhaochen

customer_reviews.title: Great Stain Fighting Detergent!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this laundry detergent! I've been cycling through various eco friendly brands and haven't had the best luck with stain fighting properties. My toddler LOVES to eat and lives to be outside getting dirty so I'm in need of some heavy duty stain fighting detergent. So far this detergent has proven to be a good fit. The scent is very light and mild, which I prefer to something too perfumey.
customer_reviews.author: Pinksand

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is awful. My baby's clothes don't seem clean when I'm done washing them with this detergent. After months of using this, I feel like all the clothes have a little stink to them, and it doesn't do a great job getting stains out either. I'm switching to regular free and clear detergent in hopes that my baby's clothes will actually be clean when they come out of the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Elishema Fishman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this laundry soap! The essential oils in it make it smell great and I can still use it on my lil guys clothes even though he's allergic to everything! The natural oils don't cause reactions thankfully!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin, need only a little per wash
customer_reviews.text: Great product for sensitive skins. We used Tide Free and Clear before this. It worked great for us. However, when I saw that Seventh Generation made this product, we immediately switched. We use their dishwasher pacs and dishwashing liquid as well. The bottle is about half/third size of your regular Tide size. However, they say that its concentrated. So I use about a third or so of what I would use other detergents. This has worked out well for us.
customer_reviews.author: S. George

customer_reviews.title: Smells great. Would not use it for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Would not use it for cloth diapers, however. The best Seventh Generation detergent for that is the Ultra Power Plus (according to Fluff Love & CD Science on Facebook). This one ranks right in the middle for liquid, plant-based detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: I like this soap for baby's clothes
customer_reviews.text: I like this soap for baby's clothes. Soap did not leak, box was in perfect shape when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: love seventh gen baby
customer_reviews.text: I like this baby detergent alot -these are small concentrated bottles so they are easy to store because they dont take up alot of space
customer_reviews.author: Meet Me in Montauk

customer_reviews.title: Good baby laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Good baby laundry detergent. Been using it for a few months now, and still have no problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Margie P

customer_reviews.title: We use the baby detergent and it is great! Our little guy has very sensitive skin and ...
customer_reviews.text: We use the baby detergent and it is great! Our little guy has very sensitive skin and this does not irritate it. Very happy with how it cleans his clothes and that it does not have any fragrance to it.
customer_reviews.author: LAP

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Love seventh generation laundry detergent! I only wish this was fragrance free. Otherwise very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: You can call me AL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Cleans up 6 year olds baseball uniform :-)
customer_reviews.author: Erin Barela

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get used to the fragrance, newborn has rashes, not sure if it's because of the soap
customer_reviews.author: Crimson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to get out the stains and smells from baby's laundry! We use it in a new style front loading washer, and it performs perfectly. We will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Elle S

customer_reviews.title: Soooo gentle
customer_reviews.text: Only detergent my son in law will use for my grandson's clothes
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Mele

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders on baby clothes covered in spit up. Barely has any scent (the very faint smell is pleasing and not offensive like many "baby" detergents) so it can be used for the whole family's laundry and gets everything nice & clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brown eyed girl

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Puke to poop, blood to berries, I have yet to meet a stain this won't get out! I don't even use stain fighters anymore-I just pour a little of this detergent on the spot and throw it in the basket. I LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: JH in NC

customer_reviews.title: Cleans our newborn clothes pretty well - does not remove stains much (guess I ...
customer_reviews.text: Cleans our newborn clothes pretty well - does not remove stains much (guess I have to pre-soak it with the detergent to get rid of the stains). Expensive compared to other baby laundry detergents
customer_reviews.author: Siddharth Arun

customer_reviews.title: Good for Babies, Parents and Bunnies
customer_reviews.text: I use this detergent for all washables related to my baby. In fact, I started using this before my little one was born to wash her layette set(s), sheets and blankets (part of the nesting process, I suppose). The scent is very slight and very light-- after washing and drying the scent is not left on any of the items. The detergent is 4X concentrated so a little goes a long way. It does well for pre-treating stains as well. It's also hypoallergenic and cruelty-free which makes me love this product even more. This detergent is a bit pricey so the Amazon Mom/subscribe & save is a real cost savings.
customer_reviews.author: Luvs2Cook

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: i feel it is difficult to wash clean .not very good
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ma

customer_reviews.title: It's working great so far
customer_reviews.text: This has become our new daily laundry liquid after my baby was born. It's working great so far, and cleans clothing great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: F.W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Due to allergies this is one of the few laundry detergents I can use
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a ton of different laundry detergents to wash my three kids' clothes - both of my boys have sensitive skin and are prone to eczema breakouts. All of the other brands I tried were fragrance free and dye free, free & clear, etc. Every time I've gone back to Seventh Generation for my youngest son's skin...this is the only detergent that doesn't cause his skin to get irritated. Better price on Amazon that buying it at the store too.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in CA

customer_reviews.title: Love it for the kids clothes
customer_reviews.text: I've used Seventh Generation's baby laundry detergent for the past few years and love it! Two of my kids have eczema and this does not irritate their skin. I wash with cold water and follow the guidelines for how much to use... their clothes are always fresh and clean after the one wash. I used to use the fragrance free version but couldn't find it anymore. This is only lightly scented (smells good). I have a front-loading HE washer and have no issues with extra suds.
customer_reviews.author: FullCode

customer_reviews.title: Great size, cleans well, nice light scent
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Seventh Generation, in general, and the baby detergent is another win. The 4-pack of small, concentrated liquid are great. Don't take up too much room on my laundry shelf, the others are easy to store in the closet with overflow tissues, TP, etc... We have been using this for all the baby's laundry as well as any dedicates. The light scent is lovely - and we are all very sensitive to scents, especially chemical ones - no problems here.
customer_reviews.author: Molly E. H. Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and the cloth looks clean no any bad smelling.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Only one bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is for only one bottle of detergent! Extremely overpriced!
customer_reviews.author: Wearingveggies

customer_reviews.title: Better for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Better for the environment, better for the kids and it gets the stains out. The scent is acceptable. I wish that it came in the cardboard bottle. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I don't have kids, but I HATE smelly laundry detergent, and I've been trying to switch to more earth-friendly products. This works great. Even in cold water. I've gotten coffee (with lots of fatty cream) all over shirts, even delicate ones. I put some of this detergent on them, let it sit and they washed perfectly. It also lasts quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: nicreis

customer_reviews.title: Favorite baby/kids detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is the only laundry detergent that didn't aggravate my baby's eczema. I wish I started using it earlier. It also worked great for cloth diapers. We did have one shipment that leaked a little. But since then they have improved packaging, taping down caps, and we have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: DeTuatha

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is really concentrated and a little amount of it goes a long way. I used a little in a portable washing machine (about < 1 oz liquid for a 6 lb load) and it produced so much lather that I had to rinse it thrice. I have reduced the quantity to like just a couple of squeezes from a hand soap dispenser and it works out fine. I haven't had to use the detergent on really messy or stinky clothes yet. Will update the review if I'm not happy with the results with the actual messy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: DiVa

customer_reviews.title: I like this as much as seventh generation's natural laundry soap ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this as much as seventh generation's natural laundry soap - not convinced that the price increase for the "baby" portion is justified with already reduced chemicals in the natural product. Will likely continue to purchase the non-baby option at a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand but...
customer_reviews.text: I only received one bottle and I thought I was getting two bottles. The image in the description show two bottles so this is confusing. So for 1 small bottle this is very pricey! The detergent itself is great so too bad this isn't a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: its so good for my baby cloths and towels
customer_reviews.text: its so good for my baby cloths and towels , we love it , initially my junior had red rash in his wholebody .after using this laundry liquid it worked like charm rash ran away in a week , we are so happy about the product . :) :) :) Awesome Results .. Yeaaaaayyy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small and too expensive. Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love all Seventh Generation products. But this review is for the price and packaging. 40 oz is a waste of money and is not an environmentally conscious packaging. This was such a RIP OFF!!! More expensive and soooooo small, waste of packaging and each bottle only lasted 2 loads!!!! My advice is just go to buybuyBaby or Target and buy the bigger bottle for half the price on Amazon. Worst buy ever!
customer_reviews.author: MommaJo

product_meta.title: Seventh Generation Concentrated Baby Laundry Detergent, Fresh Scent, 40 Fl Oz, Pack of 2
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Baby BlossomBaby love is big. But so are baby messes. Let us help. Seventh Generation’s Concentrated Baby Laundry Detergent uses plant-based cleaning power to make quick work of your baby’s most impressive spit-up or diaper invention. It works so great on your baby’s washables (including cloth diapers) because it’s specially formulated to battle the tough stains only babies can make. Plus, it’s free from synthetic fragrances, artificial brighteners, and dyes. Our concentrated formula also uses less added water, so it delivers twice the loads of a typical laundry bottle—53 loads in a 40oz container! We believe you deserve to know what’s in the products you buy, so we list our ingredients—right on the package. Now that’s big love.
feature_bullets: Concentrated baby laundry detergent made to target tough baby stains.
Provides a powerful clean with 97% plant-based ingredients
Free of synthetic fragrances, dyes, and artificial brighteners
Works great on all your baby’s washables, including cloth diapers

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
